mapper.select: select id, menu_name, path, component, visible, status, perms, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, parent from table_menu where id = #{id}
select id, menu_name, path, component, visible, status, perms, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, parent from myBlog.table_menu
mapper.insert: insert into table_menu(menu_name, path, component, visible, status, perms, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, parent) values (#{menuName}, #{path}, #{component}, #{visible}, #{status}, #{perms}, #{icon}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark}, #{parent})

insert into table_menu(menu_name, path, component, visible, status, perms, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, parent) values
(#{entity.menuName}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.component}, #{entity.visible}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.perms}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.parent})

insert into table_menu(menu_name, path, component, visible, status, perms, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, parent) values
(#{entity.menuName}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.component}, #{entity.visible}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.perms}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.parent})
on duplicate key update menu_name = values(menu_name), path = values(path), component = values(component), visible = values(visible), status = values(status), perms = values(perms), icon = values(icon), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), remark = values(remark), parent = values(parent)
mapper.update:
update table_menu
menu_name = #{menuName},
path = #{path},
component = #{component},
visible = #{visible},
status = #{status},
perms = #{perms},
icon = #{icon},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark = #{remark},
parent = #{parent},
where id = #{id}
